name: balthazar-tender-monitoring
description: Agentic system for tender monitoring and analysis - Balthazar Consulting

scripts.test:filter:all: npm run test:filter:batch && npm run test:filter:individual && npm run test:filter:logic && npm run test:filter:edges && npm run test:filter:performance
scripts.test:retry:all: npm run test:retry:mock && npm run test:retry:scheduler && npm run test:retry:metrics && npm run test:retry:consistency
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:retry:mock && npm run test:retry:scheduler && npm run test:retry:metrics && npm run test:retry:consistency
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:filter:all && npm run test:scheduler:unit
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
